role.argrole: entities which are mixed together in arg1

example.parse: (IP (NP-TMP (NT 如今)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 混杂) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 各) (CLP (M 类))) (NP (NN 文化) (NN 影响))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (PU 「) (NN 澳门式) (PU 」))) (VP (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VV 成) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (NP-LOC (NP-PN (NR 澳门)) (NP (NN 文化))) (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 精彩)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 部分))))))
example.arg: 各 类 文化 影响

example.parse: (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (VP (VV 混杂))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 文化))) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (NP-PN (NR 澳门)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 重要)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 资财)))))
